turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order some pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four medium pizzas, all with gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first one I need extra cheese and sausage only. The second one I need bell peppers, onions, extra tomato sauce and olives. The third one I need pepperoni, sausage, Canadian bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, can you please repeat the second?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. The second one, I need olives, extra sauce, onions, mushrooms, and pepperoni. The third one, I need pepperoni, sausage, Canadian bacon, regular bacon, beef.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And extra cheese. And the last one, I just need pepperoni, extra sauce, and extra cheese. And that is it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'll repeat your order: 4 medium gluten free crust pizzas. sausage and extra cheese on the first, the second will have olives, extra sauce, onions, mushrooms and pepperoni. the third: pepperoni, sausage, canadian bacon, regular bacon, beef and extra cheese. the fourth: pepperoni, extra sauce and cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, and that's at the local Bella Luna's. When when will it be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at Bella Luna's in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is perfect. Thank you very much.
